Title: 12 Rounds
Overview: When New Orleans Police Detective Danny Fisher stops a brilliant thief from getting away with a multimillion-dollar heist, the thief's girlfriend is accidentally killed. After escaping from prison, the criminal mastermind enacts his revenge, taunting Danny with 12 rounds of near-impossible puzzles and tasks that he must somehow complete to save the life of the woman he loves.
Tagline: Can you survive 12 rounds for the one you love?
production_companies: The Mark Gordon Company, Fox Atomic, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, WWE Studios, Midnight Sun Pictures
Cast: John Cena, Aidan Gillen, Ashley Scott
clean_text: 12 round new orleans police detective danny fisher stop brilliant thief get away multimilliondollar heist thief girlfriend accidentally kill escape prison criminal mastermind enact revenge taunt danny 12 round nearimpossible puzzle task complete save life woman love survive 12 round one love action thriller crime renny harlin john cena aidan gillen ashley scott 2009
